articles.author: Brian Osgood
articles.title: At least nine people killed in shooting at South Africa tavern - Al Jazeera
articles.description: South African police say a manhunt is under way after a mass shooting killed at least nine people and injured 10.
articles.content:
Follow live coverage of South Africa shooting here.
Armed men have opened fire at a tavern in a township near the city of Johannesburg in South Africa, killing at least nine people and wounding 10, … [+1658 chars]
